docs: S3-compatible object storage tool. Works with AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO, Backblaze B2, and any S3-compatible provider. Set S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID, S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY, S3_ENDPOINT env vars. Supports presigned URL generation for direct uploads/downloads.
